name: Big Trouble at Deimo's Base
description: //************************// After defeating the two biggest demons you've ever seen, you find yourself at Deimo's Base. But something is wrong. The air is filled with the Corruption wich came from the portals of Phobos Anomaly. It seems the place is not what you knew, habited by terrors you encountered and ones never seen. Load your pistol and make them pay! //*********************//
